content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; furnace_source holds iron ore (48 units).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"]; fuel inventory includes coal (2 units) and furnace_result contains 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs for research; status: NO_POWER; electrical_id: 3456.
- ElectricityGroup with id=3456 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; fluid_box holds approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); associated with fluid_system [11460].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; associated with fluid_system [11460].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=11460 at position(-6.5, 20.5), status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=11461 at position(-2.5, 20.5), status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=11462 at position(-0.5, 21.5), status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=11467 at position(-3.5, 23.5), status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=11466 at position(-7.5, 25.5), status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=11471 at position(3.5, 25.5), status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=11470 at position(2.5, 24.5), status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=11473 at position(-0.5, 28.5), status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────
• Incorrect Fluid System References and Connection Attempts:
  - Multiple connection attempts using fluid_system IDs [11116, 11159, 11202, 11245, 11288, 11331, 11374, 11417] failed to supply water to the steam engine. Validate and select a working PipeGroup—such as the one with fluid_system=11460—before initiating further connection attempts.

• Redundant Pipeline Stabilization Delays:
  - Repeated 10-second wait periods after each failed connection attempt incur unnecessary delays. Streamline the stabilization check process to reduce time loss.

• Persistent Water Supply Connection Failure:
  - Despite several connection attempts, the steam engine remains NOT_CONNECTED. Reassess the integration between the boiler, offshore pump, and pipeline network to ensure proper fluid delivery.
